text: Ieremia Tienang Tabai (born 16 December 1949) is an I-Kiribati politician. He was the first President of Kiribati. He was the youngest ever Chief minister of the Commonwealth of Nations and then became the youngest ever head of State. During his presidency, he was considered the most capable leader of the Pacific island countries. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:I-Kiribati people Category:Oceanic politicians
title: Ieremia Tabai
